WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
i got an exception on loading character-data from armory. Also the bug is reproduceable every time.
Loading character-data via xml still works.
 
PS: The character i've tried to load was 'Cuzano' from EU-Server Alleria (German). Maybe it's some data issue, but the exception occurs with other chars too.
 
== Version: 4.1.5.0 ==
 
== Error Message ==
[Xml_InvalidRootData]
Argumente: ;1;1
Debuggingressourcen-Zeichenfolgen sind nicht verfügbar. Oft enthalten der Schlüssel und die Argumente genügend Informationen zur Diagnose des Problems. Weitere Informationen erhalten Sie unter http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60310.0&File=System.Xml.dll&Key=Xml_InvalidRootData

WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Exception on loading character-data from armory

Comments.Message:
Also still getting the same issue - I noticed it has been resolved in another ticket by Jothay recently but still seems to persist in both online and offline versions at least for some characters. Tried reinstalling offline version to ensure its the latest, still errors for Fuddy - Azuremyst. Also tried other 85's I have (Feudal, Mojitos) but same error.

Error (same as above but in English basically):

I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.

== Version: 4.1.5.0 ==

== Error Message ==
[Xml_InvalidRootData]
Arguments: ,1,1
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60310.0&File=System.Xml.dll&Key=Xml_InvalidRootData

== StackTrace ==
   at System.Xml.XmlTextReaderImpl.Throw(Exception e)

   at System.Xml.XmlTextReaderImpl.ParseRootLevelWhitespace()

   at System.Xml.XmlTextReaderImpl.Read()
   at System.Xml.Linq.XDocument.Load(XmlReader reader, LoadOptions options)

[Please fill in steps here]

Interestingly, I tried an armory mentioned in the ticket thats been marked fixed (Dresden on the Destromath server in the US region http://us.battle.net/wow/en/character/destromath/dresden/simple) and that works.

Is the issue perhaps that it works for US armories but not EU armories. What are the odds that they changed data formats for one regions armory but not the other .....
Oh and by "they" I mean Blizzard btw before anyone thinks I'm criticising Rawr developers :)
